extensionFullName.message: Landmark Navigation via Keyboard or Pop-up

extensionDescription.message: Allows you to navigate a web page via WAI-ARIA landmarks, using the keyboard or a pop-up menu.

nextLandmarkShortcutDescription.message: Move to and highlight the next landmark

previousLandmarkShortcutDescription.message: Move to and highlight the previous landmark

mainLandmarkShortcutDescription.message: Move to and highlight the main landmark

errorGettingLandmarksFromContentScript.message: Sorry, there was an error when trying to find landmarks

prefsDebugInfo.message: Show debugging info in the console
